translated: Jātaka🔽The Collection of Middle-Length Texts🔽The Chapter on the Forest

analyzed: aṇḍa jena jalābu ja  vivariya dāṭham sesi
translated: an egg-born with a water-born,🔽you sat down after breaking the egg.
Where did your fear come from?”
“Even with a signal to an enemy,
I don’t trust even a friend.
Fear has arisen from a place of safety.
